mapper.select: SELECT ne_id, ne_name, ne_session, ne_dice, ne_php, ne_mhp, ne_patk, ne_matk, ne_gold, ne_luck FROM normalevent WHERE (LOWER(ne_session)='none' OR LOWER(ne_session)=LOWER(#{session})) AND ne_id NOT IN ( SELECT event_id FROM used_events WHERE player_id = #{playerId} AND layer = #{layer} AND event_type = 'normal' ) ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1
SELECT ne_id, ne_name, ne_session, ne_dice, ne_php, ne_mhp, ne_patk, ne_matk, ne_gold, ne_luck FROM normalevent WHERE ne_id = #{ne_id} LIMIT 1

SELECT sec_id, se_id, sec_opt, sec_php, sec_pmaxhp, sec_mhp, sec_mmaxhp, sec_patk, sec_matk, sec_gold, sec_luck,sec_text FROM selectevent_choice WHERE sec_id = #{sec_id} LIMIT 1

SELECT ce_id, ce_name, ce_session FROM cardevent WHERE (LOWER(ce_session)='none' OR LOWER(ce_session)=LOWER(#{session})) AND ce_id NOT IN ( SELECT event_id FROM used_events WHERE player_id = #{playerId} AND layer = #{layer} AND event_type = 'card' ) ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1

SELECT s.skill_id, s.skill_name, s.skill_job, s.element, s.rarity, s.skill_type, s.skill_text FROM PlayerDB p JOIN SkillDB s ON TRUE WHERE p.Player_ID = #{playerId} -- 보유(Own_Skill)에는 없는 카드만 (CSV: "11,12,13") AND (p.Own_Skill IS NULL OR p.Own_Skill = '' OR FIND_IN_SET(s.skill_id, p.Own_Skill) = 0) -- 카드 이벤트 스킬만 필요하면 유지(원본에 있었다면 유지; 필요 없으면 이 줄 지워도 무방) AND LOWER(s.skill_type) = 'event' -- 직업/세션만 반영 (희귀도 제외) AND (LOWER(s.skill_job) = 'common' OR LOWER(s.skill_job) = LOWER(p.Using_Character)) AND (LOWER(s.element) = 'none' OR LOWER(s.element) = LOWER(p.WhereSession)) ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT a.ID AS ArtifactID, a.Name AS ArtifactName, a.Job AS ArtifactJob, a.Session AS ArtifactSession, a.Effect AS ArtifactEffect, a.Description AS ArtifactDescription FROM ArtifactDB a WHERE (LOWER(a.Session) = 'none' OR LOWER(a.Session) = 'event') AND (LOWER(a.Job) = 'common' OR LOWER(a.Job) = LOWER(#{job})) ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT a.ID AS ArtifactID, a.Name AS ArtifactName, a.Job AS ArtifactJob, a.Session AS ArtifactSession, a.Effect AS ArtifactEffect, a.Description AS ArtifactDescription FROM ArtifactDB a WHERE a.ID = #{id} LIMIT 1

SELECT be_id, be_name, be_session, MonsterID FROM bossevent WHERE (LOWER(be_session)='none' OR LOWER(be_session)=LOWER(#{session})) AND be_id NOT IN ( SELECT event_id FROM used_events WHERE player_id = #{playerId} AND layer = 'GLOBAL' AND event_type = 'boss' ) ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1
SELECT be_id, be_name, be_session, MonsterID FROM bossevent WHERE be_id = #{be_id} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO used_events (player_id, layer, event_type, event_id) VALUES (#{playerId}, #{layer}, #{type}, #{eventId}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE used_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
